body: Thanks. The reason was the "code" input. For some reason you had the code input to be shown for Orientation Study Parameters. You need to remove the input and try again. I added a warning to the update component to catch this case. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/24rKmCGAvAOUxrTZ5ELq71Mct07rqNyilnBFVZ1evPJIflmzOR5tGUxLs1QmaVOxST*lqDpdHRVfJtxsc4A1ZO0ld4oQijW7/codeInput.png)
